main event: A single unidentified flying object (UFO) was observed over the USS Saratoga in the Mediterranean Sea near Italy.
interesting points: The UFO initially appeared as a glowing ball the size of 100,000 feet in diameter, which suddenly reduced in size to 20,000 feet in diameter and maintained this reduced size.
The UFO had a red fire ball appearance with a blue-green tail.
The UFO initially appeared to be the size of the surface of the moon.
The UFO passed over the USS Saratoga in 15 seconds at an estimated speed of 5,000 mph.
The UFO impacted the water 30 to 50 miles south of Rome and appeared to burn out at an altitude of 10,000 feet.
